div.p: If you would like to virtually attend the school board meeting tonight, please use the link or phone numbers below:
You are invited to a Zoom webinar.

p.strong: When: Apr 28, 2020 05:30 PM Pacific Time (US and Canada)

br.br:
Please click the link below to join the webinar:
https://qsd-wednet-edu.zoom.us/j/91109139483
Or iPhone one-tap :
US: +12532158782,,91109139483# or +16699006833,,91109139483#
Or Telephone:
Dial(for higher quality, dial a number based on your current location):
US: +1 253 215 8782 or +1 669 900 6833 or +1 346 248 7799 or +1 301 715 8592 or +1 312 626 6799 or +1 646 558 8656
Webinar ID: 911 0913 9483
International numbers available:https://qsd-wednet-edu.zoom.us/u/adbZzde1TC

hr.p: If you would like to share feedback or a concern with the board, you are welcome to communicate with the entire board and the superintendent via email. While members of the community are welcome to email board members or the superintendent independently, the best way to ensure all board members simultaneously receive the same information is to use the email the address below. All emails sent to the school board, or any district employee, are subject to public disclosure.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

span.strong: Its not too late to register for kindergarten!

p.span: You can download and complete the kindergarten registration packet on our website.

br.span: Click on our link below for more information and to download the packet.

span.span: No es demasiado tarde para registrarse para el kinder!

p.span: Puede descargar y completar el paquete de registro de Kinder en nuestro sitio web. Haga clic en el enlace abajo para obtener ms informacin y descargar el paquete.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

div.p: Not receiving Remind notifications on your phone from the Quincy School District or your students school?
Wondering about adding a new phone number or updating your phone number to your Remind account? Wondering about adding an email?
Check out the help sheet for instructions on how to set up and change your notifications on Remind.
If you have trouble logging into your account, please direct message us or call the District Office at 787-4571 and leave a message and we will help get you set up

hr.p: No recibe notificaciones de Remind en su telfono del Distrito Escolar de Quincy o de la escuela de su hijo/a?
Quiere agregar un nuevo nmero de telfono or cambiar su telfono a su cuenta de Remind? Quiere agregar un correo electrnico?
Vea la "hoja de ayuda" para obtener instrucciones sobre cmo configurar y cambiar sus notificaciones en Remind.
Si tiene problemas para ingresar a su cuenta, por favor envenos un mensaje directo o llame a la Oficina del Distrito al 787-4571 y deje un mensaje y le ayudaremos a ingresar.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

div.p: QSD Families, per the Grant County Health District the following facilities have been closed until further notice.
Familias del Distrito Escolar de Quincy, por el Distrito de Salud del Condado de Grant las siguientes instalaciones han sido cerradas hasta nuevo aviso.

OfficeHours:
Temporarily Closed until further notice
